I need food. And right now the fridge is...well..."empty" is such a small word. I can't describe the emptiness of my fridge. It's unspeakably empty. Oh well...let's light up some more cigarettes...and listen to some music. I just found out that there are other romanians here. I was suprised...in a pleasant way. Ahhh...my stomach is killing me. Damn it! I gotta cut this crap. All i do is complain and complain and complain. Let's see...i'll try and find the beauty in these shitty past months. Well...i smoked alot...and ate good food and...had some sort of fun...but...that's all i think. These past few months have been horrible. I don't know what got into me. I don't have the mood for nothing. I just want to lay down and do nothing. but i find that boring as well. School's more of a torture house for me...they keep nagging and nagging me with idiotic questions and stupid problems that will never be of any use to me. But i guess that's school...damn it! PS: i'm not one of those characters that just want to kill themselves. I'm just having a shitty period and i hope i'll get over it soon...
